pullRequest.title: Fixed user groups redirect routing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes
Created AdminUserGroupsPage that imports in the user groups components to be used in the admin panel and provides them with the correct admin panel routing so redirects work as intended. To test ensure that the redirects work correctly within the admin panel and outside as well.
Related issue
N/A
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:

 CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.
 Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
 User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

nodes.bodyText: Consider use useResetFormOnCloseModal it automatically resets the form when the modal closes.  See AddGroupButton.jsx.
Call the setBaseUrl on it here. Even better would be creating a constant for the url since it is the same as what you are passing in the path
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -43,8 +43,8 @@ export function UserGroups() {
     >
       <RolesProvider rolesFn={getUserGroupRoles}>
         <Router style={{ height: "100%" }}>
-          <UserGroupsPage path={setBaseUrl("/groups")} />
-          <UserGroupsDetailsPage path={setBaseUrl("/groups/:id")} />
+          <UserGroupsPage baseUrl={"/groups"} path={setBaseUrl("/groups")} />

nodes.bodyText: Same here, I think it is more clear to call setBaseUrl here since you only append to it in the child component.

commit.message: Changed baseUrl usage, modified delete user group button to allow usage in admin panel, still need to fix tests

nodes.bodyText: Since setBaseUrl("/admin/groups") is called multiple times it would be better to set this as a constant
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,8 +19,8 @@ export default function AdminUserGroupsPage() {
   return (
       <RolesProvider rolesFn={getUserGroupRoles}>
         <Router>
-          <UserGroupsPage baseUrl={"/admin/groups"} path={setBaseUrl("")} />
-          <UserGroupsDetailsPage baseUrl={"/admin/groups"} path={setBaseUrl("/:id")} />
+          <UserGroupsPage baseUrl={setBaseUrl("/admin/groups")} path={setBaseUrl("")} />

commit.message: Fixed user groups tests by waiting for route change, added deletion notification that still needs to be fixed to show up in admin panel
Changed delete user group notification to use antd and fixed problem of it not showing up in admin panel

nodes.bodyText: You don't need to interpolate the baseUrl here just navigate(baseUrl, {replace:true}).

commit.message: Allowed Admin Panel to work with modified context path and fixed side menu selection

nodes.bodyText:
One last change otherwise everything else is good to go from my end. Can you create a function that does this instead of doing it inline and add a comment to the function as to why this needs to be done
keyname[0].split('/')[0]

commit.message: Updated JSDoc for baseUrl and added parseKey method for side menu item selection

nodes.bodyText: Can you move this to the top of the function, I like to have all the useState's together

commit.message: Added baseUrl JSDoc to more files
